text:
Primarily I would like the option to disable it. I have a client that asked if it was possible. It wasn't there previously, so they were hoping it could be turned off.

I would like to be able to choose between the project name and custom text for the Powered by label. I would much prefer for it to read Powered by [Agency Name]
Yeah this is exactly what I want
Iâ€™d love this feature as well!
Are we able to add more than one tab in an object record? And have a couple of custom cards in each tab or can we only have one?
